name: Slimagotchi - MiniJam 73
description:
HOW TO
- backspace to turn on / off the console
- space to validate
- left/right arrow to select item

UPDATE
- adding exp
- adding menu description
- tweaking UI

Keep your slime alive by feeding it and cleaning the screen from other monster.
This version is a concept prototype I begin for the MiniJam 73.

Other option will be available on an other version with also more color like:
- Building your place
- Unlocking landscape
- Shop for items to keep your slime safe

music/sfx : Sam Dudley
programming: Kyohko Shiori
